issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Gandiva does not pick runtime cpu features
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7399](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7399). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~yibo]`  reported that the IR code generated by gandiva is using 128-bit registers even though the test machine has cpu with avx2 feature. I was able to reproduce the same on a  gce host.
